item.title: Create a New Hugo Site
item.description: Prerequisites hugo Install Hugo on Fedora sudo dnf install hugo 1. sudo dnf install snap 2. snap install hugo Initial Setup hugo new site PROJECT NAME cd PROJECT NAME git init Setup a Github Repository Create a new repository Repository settings > Source: master branch /docs folder git remote add origin REPO ADDRESS: usually git@github.com:...git git pull origin master Setup Custom Theme: zmd Fork the Github repository.
